extension.description: A simple, unofficial, No-IP update client that runs as Kodi service to periodically update your dynamic DNS record. Meant to be used when your OpenELEC machine hosts the PVR backend and you want manage your bookings from remote (via web or App).
extension.disclaimer: Unofficial, simply I could not find an already existing solution.
